mutants.code:
import string

def reverse_unique_words(s):
    s = s.lower()
    translator = str.maketrans('MUTATED', '', string.punctuation)
    s = s.translate(translator)
    words = s.split()
    unique_words = set(words)
    return list(unique_words)[::-1]

import string

def reverse_unique_words(s):
    s = s.lower()
    translator = str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation)
    s = s.translate(translator)
    words = s.split()
    unique_words = set(words)
    return list(unique_words)[::+1]

import string

def reverse_unique_words(s):
    s = s.lower()
    translator = str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation)

    words = s.split()
    unique_words = set(words)
    return list(unique_words)[::-2]

import string

def reverse_unique_words(s):
    s = s.lower()
    translator = str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation)
    s = s.translate(translator)
    words = s.split()
    unique_words = set(words)
    return list(unique_words)[::--1]
